game.name: deer hunter II
game.shortDescription: An archaeological survival game. Survive the desert, craft items, find remains of other players, and face your final challenge . . .
game.shortDescriptionEn: An archaeological survival game. Survive the desert, craft items, find remains of other players, and face your final challenge . . .

reviewHighlights.text: The game was a fun little experience. Each play-through took me a little over an hour. My biggest issue is [spoiler]that if you shoot the blue orb bef...
